name: E. Strange Operation
statement:
Koa the Koala has a binary string s of length n. Koa can perform no more
than n-1 (possibly zero) operations of the following form:In one
operation Koa selects positions i and i+1 for some i with 1
le i < |s| and sets s_i to max(s_i, s_{i+1}). Then Koa deletes position
i+1 from s (after the removal, the remaining parts are
concatenated).Note that after every operation the length of s decreases
by 1.How many different binary strings can Koa obtain by doing no more
than n-1 (possibly zero) operations modulo 10^9+7 (1000000007)?
